2100650.name: Tunnel Boat Terror
2100650.description:
A racing simulation and arcade game based on Tunnel Boats and Hydroplanes. Explore beautiful race locations in a variety of unique watercraft, including some of the fastest and most iconic power boats in the world. Improve your skill, upgrade your equipment, expand your garage, customize your hull, and dominate the competition. A brand-new boat racing experience for enthusiasts and newcomers alike, made in cooperation with the oldest and largest sanctioning organization in the world.

An Outboard Performance Craft is one of the fastest and most agile vehicles on the planet. Weighing under 450kg, including the driver, it can execute a full 180° turn nearly instantaneously, subjecting the driver to 4g's in the tightest corners. Approximately 6½ meters in length, they are powered by a single V6 two-stroke outboard engine and equipped with a three or four-blade supercavitating propeller. With over 400hp and capable of revving beyond 9,000rpm, these boats can accelerate from 0 to 100km/h in under two seconds and achieve top speeds of 250km/h. Hydraulic trim allows the driver to tilt the motor in and out of the water for optimal maneuverability.
An Inboard Hydroplane is a stunning sight on the water, known for its blistering speed, sleek design, impressive rooster tails, and thunderous noise. Powered by a supercharged V8 engine with a staggering 1,400hp and cranking over 8,000rpm, they can reach speeds up to 260km/h. With a load of around 1,350kg, with the driver, and measuring 7 meters in length, these boats demonstrate extraordinary speed and agilty while throwing massive walls of water into the air. To manage lift and stability, hydroplanes use a canard and rely on a skid fin and rudder for turning.

Jetsprint, Unlimited Hydroplane, Mod-V, Super Stock, Tri-Hull, Crackerbox, Stock Hydro, Stock Runabout, K-Boat, Class One, PWC, Stunt Craft

Locate and save stranded vessels, remove debris from active race courses, help crashed racers, or chase criminals while playing as the Coast Guard.

Experience fast-paced, unforgiving, circuit, sprint, and drag racing with real power boats. Overtake opponents with strategic turns, precise throttling, and expert trim control. Execute nearly instantaneous 180° turns, accelerate from 0-100km/h in under two seconds, navigate without brakes or traction to a road, smash buoys, and hydroplane on the razor's edge. Explore the open water, play arcade games, face challengers, discover upgrades, and enjoy boat racing at its finest!

Race against real power boat drivers from all over the world from a variety of classes. Using the latest 3D software we're able to import drivers right into the cockpit. We're working on allowing you to create your own driver as well.

Race on over 50 different wave patterns for both lake and ocean water. Boats, buoys, and debris all interact with the water surface using realistic buoyancy and physics. Rooster tails, wakes, rain, muddy water, thunderstorms, water blinding your vision. It's going to get wet! Developed with Unreal Engine®. Utilizing the Epic Games Water Plugin, Fluid Ninja Live, and custom-tailored by our development team, TBT plans to be an immersive aquatic experience. Dynamic environments where players can race including; the ocean, vast lakes, man made courses, shallow meandering rivers, castle moats and many other unique locations.

Modify the weather, wind, water, and time of day. Race on a dark and stormy night or at the break of dawn with the moon still in the sky. Adjust the strength of the wind or change the waves to make it easier or more difficult to play and race.

Grand Prix Hydroplane, Garage Customization, Quick Pit Performance Tuning, Level Design, Engine Sounds, Steering, Trim, Sinking, Listing, Flipping, Rolling, Crashing & Damage, Pre-Race Setup, Instant Replays, Full Controller Support, Steam Controller Support, Character Creation/Selection, Local/LAN Multiplayer, Steam Leaderboards, Steam Achievements, VR Support, Support for Race Wheels.

Join Discord® or send us your email on the website and get a free Beta Key to start testing and providing feedback right now. Be the first to learn about release dates, news, contests, future DLC, and more.
